title: Microsoft bookshelf 1994 (MAC)
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Encyclopedias and dictionaries
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Children's encyclopedias and dictionaries
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Multimedia systems
description: Redefine reference work with lightning fast searches, easy to access information, and rich sound live action and animation. Included are updates of American Heritage Dictionary, Bartlett's familiar quotations, Concise Columbia dictionary of quotations, Concise Columbia encyclopedia, Hammond atlas, Roget's II electronic thesaurus, World almanac and book of facts 1993. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: Colour Macintosh II or higher, Colour Classic or Powerbook; System 7 or later; 4Mb of memory; At least 2 Mb of available hard disk space; CD ROM drive.
